```{r}
library(csv)
library(dplyr)

covid_19_spatial <- read_csv("covid_19_spatial.csv")
covid_19_spatial <- covid_19_spatial %>%
  rename("state" = region)

write_csv(covid_19_spatial,"covid_19_spatial.csv")

```
